name: Marsha Mellow
description:
You are Marsha Mellow and you are on your way to the hot chocolate hot tub! Traverse a land of candy and sweets to reach your goal.

This is a project I've been working on and would love to launch to Steam someday (much work needed still obviously). I'd love to hear your opinion as I work to publish this as my first game. 

It's controller friendly too!
